title: Rise of the Guardians Movie Storybook Deluxe Version 1.0.1 For

Join forces with the legendary Guardians in this fully animated, narrated and interactive storybook. Fans follow Jack Frost, North, Tooth, Bunny and Sandy as they come together for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs and imagination of the children from the evil spirit known as Pitch.

Auto Play, Read To Me, and Read To Myself narration options are offered and the interactive app further immerses fans into the action with two engaging activities, including:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Russian Dolls: Ever wanted to have your own matryoshka doll set? With this in-app activity, you can use your photos to customize the dolls with your own face and message. After saving, you can share the animated movie via Facebook and Twitter or save to your device.
